Chile Coronavirus Statistics

Thank the coronavirus repository(RamiKrispin 2020) for providing the raw data.

Now I use some essential functions in R to do a brief analysis about Chile coronavirus data.This time I will focus on plots to help people to have a better data visualisation.

References

RamiKrispin. 2020. “Coronavirus.” https://github.com/RamiKrispin/coronavirus.
